Description: NO BROKER FEE Beautiful 3 bedroom/1.5 bath unit on the second floor in a multi-family house located near (Sutherland St., B line) green line train station in Brighton. Very convenient to Boston College. The unit features a living room and a modern kitchen with granite countertops and stainless steel appliances, a washer and dryer in the unit. Gleaming hardwood floors throughout. HVAC system.
